type.name: heading
type.description: Section or subsection titles with hierarchical levels

type.name: paragraph
type.description: Body text content, can span multiple lines

type.name: image
type.properties: Content field should contain descriptive alt text

type.name: list
type.properties: Can be identified as group or individual items

type.name: footnote
type.description: Reference notes, typically at bottom of page
type.properties: Often contains citation or supplementary information

type.name: link
type.properties: Content should include the URL if visible

type.name: caption
type.description: Descriptive text for figures or tables

type.name: header
type.description: Repeated content at top of page
type.properties: May include page numbers, document title

type.name: footer
type.description: Repeated content at bottom of page
type.properties: May include page numbers, copyright info

coordinate_terms.term: Bounding box - rectangular area containing the element
